title: getSOAPResponseHeader
name: getSOAPResponseHeader
description:
Returns a SOAP response header. Call this function
        from within code that is invoking a web service after
        making a web service request.

arguments.name: webservice
arguments.description: A webservice object as returned from the cfobject tag or the CreateObject function.

arguments.name: namespace
arguments.description: A String that is the namespace for the header.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: A String that is the name of the SOAP header.

arguments.name: asXML
arguments.description:
If True, the header is returned as a XML object;
            if false (default), the header is returned as a Java object.
